data.name: Global AI Community - On virtual tour
data.description: On the 8th of April 2020 the Global AI Community is hosting a 30 hour live event across timezones in different languages. Mark the date in your calendar, subscribe to our YouTube channel and tune in.

relatedRecords.description: The first Hasura user conference is happening online from 3-10 June! Join us for workshops & talks by our users, community & engineers as we explore pushing the boundaries of GraphQL with Hasura.
